ImplementedSecurityControls.MinimumDepositEnforcement: Only allows deposits above a certain threshold.
ImplementedSecurityControls.BalanceCheck: Verifies that users have enough funds before allowing withdrawals.

KnownVulnerabilities.ReentrancyRisk: CashOut is vulnerable to reentrancy as it includes an external call to msg.sender.call.value(_am) without a reentrancy guard.

SecurityMeasuresAndExistingProtections.FallbackFunctionality: Fallback function is present to allow direct ether transfers to the contract.
